00015 #ifdef PLATFORM_TELOSB
00016 #define PORT_DIR_(port) P##port##DIR
00017 #define PORT_OUT_(port) P##port##OUT
00018 #define PORT_IN_(port) P##port##IN
00019 #else
00020 #define PORT_DIR_(port) DDR##port
00021 #define PORT_OUT_(port) PORT##port
00022 #define PORT_IN_(port) PIN##port
00023 #endif
00024 
00025 #define PORT_DIR(port) PORT_DIR_(port)
00026 #define PORT_OUT(port) PORT_OUT_(port)
00027 #define PORT_IN(port) PORT_IN_(port)
00028 
00029 /* these macros set bits in a given byte */
00030 #define MASK_1(byte, bit) (byte |= (1 << bit))
00031 #define MASK_2(byte, bit1, bit2) (byte |= (1 << bit1) | (1 << bit2))
00032 #define MASK_3(byte, bit1, bit2, bit3)                  \
00033    (byte |= (1 << bit1) | (1 << bit2) | (1 << bit3))
00034 #define MASK_4(byte, bit1, bit2, bit3, bit4)                            \
00035    (byte |= (1 << bit1) | (1 << bit2) | (1 << bit3) | (1 << bit4))
00036 #define MASK_5(byte, bit1, bit2, bit3, bit4, bit5)                      \
00037    (byte |= (1 << bit1) | (1 << bit2) | (1 << bit3) | (1 << bit4) |     \
00038     (1 << bit5))
00039 #define MASK_6(byte, bit1, bit2, bit3, bit4, bit5, bit6)                \
00040    (byte |= (1 << bit1) | (1 << bit2) | (1 << bit3) | (1 << bit4) |     \
00041     (1 << bit5) | (1 << bit6))
00042 #define MASK_7(byte, bit1, bit2, bit3, bit4, bit5, bit6, bit7)          \
00043    (byte |= (1 << bit1) | (1 << bit2) | (1 << bit3) | (1 << bit4) |     \
00044     (1 << bit5) | (1 << bit6) | (1 << bit7))
00045 
00046 /* these macros clear bits in a given byte */
00047 #define UNMASK_1(byte, bit) (byte &= ~(1 << bit))
00048 #define UNMASK_2(byte, bit1, bit2) (byte &= ~((1 << bit1) |     \
00049                                               (1 << bit2)))
00050 #define UNMASK_3(byte, bit1, bit2, bit3)                \
00051    (byte &= ~((1 << bit1) | (1 << bit2) | (1 << bit3)))
00052 #define UNMASK_4(byte, bit1, bit2, bit3, bit4)                          \
00053    (byte &= ~((1 << bit1) | (1 << bit2) | (1 << bit3) | (1 << bit4)))
00054 #define UNMASK_5(byte, bit1, bit2, bit3, bit4, bit5)                    \
00055    (byte &= ~((1 << bit1) | (1 << bit2) | (1 << bit3) | (1 << bit4) |   \
00056               (1 << bit5)))
00057 #define UNMASK_6(byte, bit1, bit2, bit3, bit4, bit5, bit6)              \
00058    (byte &= ~((1 << bit1) | (1 << bit2) | (1 << bit3) | (1 << bit4) |   \
00059               (1 << bit5) | (1 << bit6)))
00060 #define UNMASK_7(byte, bit1, bit2, bit3, bit4, bit5, bit6, bit7)        \
00061    (byte &= ~((1 << bit1) | (1 << bit2) | (1 << bit3) | (1 << bit4) |   \
00062               (1 << bit5) | (1 << bit6) | (1 << bit7)))
00063 
00064 #define SET_DIR_1_(port, pin) MASK_1 (PORT_DIR(port), pin)
00065 #define SET_DIR_1(x) SET_DIR_1_ (x)
00066 #define SET_DIR_2_(port1, pin1, port2, pin2)    \
00067    MASK_2 (PORT_DIR(port1), pin1, pin2)
00068 #define SET_DIR_2(x, y) SET_DIR_2_ (x, y)
00069 #define SET_DIR_3_(port1, pin1, port2, pin2, port3, pin3)       \
00070    MASK_3 (PORT_DIR(port1), pin1, pin2, pin3)
00071 #define SET_DIR_3(x, y, z) SET_DIR_3_ (x, y, z)
00072 #define SET_DIR_4_(port1, pin1, port2, pin2, port3, pin3, port4, pin4)  \
00073    MASK_4 (PORT_DIR(port1), pin1, pin2, pin3, pin4)
00074 #define SET_DIR_4(w, x, y, z) SET_DIR_4_ (w, x, y, z)
00075 #define SET_DIR_5_(port1, pin1, port2, pin2, port3, pin3, port4, pin4,  \
00076                    port5, pin5)                                         \
00077    MASK_5 (PORT_DIR(port1), pin1, pin2, pin3, pin4, pin5)
00078 #define SET_DIR_5(v, w, x, y, z) SET_DIR_5_ (v, w, x, y, z)
00079 #define SET_DIR_6_(port1, pin1, port2, pin2, port3, pin3, port4, pin4,  \
00080                    port5, pin5, port6, pin6)                            \
00081    MASK_6 (PORT_DIR(port1), pin1, pin2, pin3, pin4, pin5, pin6)
00082 #define SET_DIR_6(u, v, w, x, y, z) SET_DIR_6_ (u, v, w, x, y, z)
00083 #define SET_DIR_7_(port1, pin1, port2, pin2, port3, pin3, port4, pin4,  \
00084                    port5, pin5, port6, pin6)                            \
00085    MASK_7 (PORT_DIR(port1), pin1, pin2, pin3, pin4, pin5, pin6, pin7)
00086 #define SET_DIR_7(t, u, v, w, x, y, z)          \
00087    SET_DIR_7_ (t, u, v, w, x, y, z)
